Dear Copyright Agent:

I am writing on behalf of TV TOKYO Medianet, Inc. and other content owners
 
("IP Owners").  TV TOKYO Medianet and other content owners owns  
distribution rights to the series mentioned above. Currently, the Apps
below operate illegally through illegal distribution of above contents and
 
through illegal monetization of above contents.

The Apps below are not authorized to operate and distribute and have  
cleared no rights for content distribution. This is our DMCA Notice of  
Infringement.

I, the undersigned, swear under penalty of perjury consistent with United 

States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in this DMCA
Notice
of Infringement is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of  
the IP Owner. I have a good faith belief that the items or materials  
identified in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized by above IP 

Owners, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owners'
rights.

If you believe you acquired the right to exhibit these items legitimately 

please provide relevant details. Otherwise, please act expeditiously to  
remove or disable access to the material or item claimed to be infringing.
